has anyone ever tried to use bootstrap 4~5 in a theme? I thought I might as well give it a go seeing how an empty theme is more flexible, but realised that HubSpot automatically inserts container classes around everything you do (and the main body) which causes massive conflicts with bootstrap classes.

Wondering if it's worth even trying anymore at this point or just give up on this
Ah nevermind, found out it was the DnD area that has all the wrappers. Removed it and the wrapper classes are gone
